document.full_text: roche's cancer drug mabthera has been recommended for use on britain's state health service as a maintenance therapy for patients with follicular non-hodgkin's lymphoma, expanding the market for the medicine.
document.title: uk's nice backs roche drug as maintenance therapy
lines_and_colors: roche's cancer drug mabthera has been recommended for use on britain's state health service as a maintenance therapy for patients with follicular non-hodgkin's lymphoma, expanding the market for the medicine.
